declaration.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
declaration.confirm: I confirm that I will administer the estate of Deceased fn Deceased ln, according to law. I will:
declaration.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks me to do so, I will:
declaration.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
declaration.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
declaration.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
declaration.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court
declaration.submitWarning: Once you click ‘Save and continue’, you cannot change your answers.
declaration.understandItem1: my application will be rejected if I do not answer any questions about the information I have given
declaration.understandItem2: proceedings for contempt of court may be brought against the undersigned if it is found that the evidence provided is deliberately untruthful or dishonest, as well as revocation of the grant

legalStatement.intro: This statement is based on the information you’ve given in your application. It will be stored as a public record.
legalStatement.deceased: Deceased fn Deceased ln was born on 1 January 1950 and died on 1 January 2020, domiciled in England and Wales.
legalStatement.applicant: I, Applicant fn Applicant ln of Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom, make the following statement:

value.name: I am an executor named in the will as Applicant fn Applicant ln, and I am applying for probate.
value.sign: I will send to the probate registry what I believe to be the true and original last will and testament of Deceased fn Deceased ln.

legalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of my knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in Deceased fn Deceased ln which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of Deceased fn Deceased ln and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
legalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: The gross value for the estate amounts to £2000000.00 and the net value for the estate amounts to £1000000.00.

welshDeclaration.accept: Rwy’n cadarnhau y byddaf yn gweinyddu ystad yr unigolyn sydd wedi marw yn unol â’r gyfraith, a bod fy  nghais yn gywir.
welshDeclaration.confirm: Rwy’n cadarnhau y byddaf yn gweinyddu ystad Deceased fn Deceased ln, yn unol â’r gyfraith. Byddaf yn:
welshDeclaration.requests: Os bydd y gofrestrfa brofiant (y llys) yn gofyn i mi, byddaf yn:
welshDeclaration.confirmItem3: cadw cofnod llawn o’r ffordd y mae’r ystad wedi cael ei gweinyddu
welshDeclaration.requestsItem1: darparu manylion llawn yr ystad a’r ffordd y cafodd ei gweinyddu
welshDeclaration.requestsItem2: dychwelyd y grant profiant i’r llys
welshDeclaration.submitWarning: Unwaith y byddwch wedi clicio ‘Arbed a pharhau’, ni allwch newid eich atebion.
welshDeclaration.understandItem1: y bydd fy nghais yn cael ei wrthod os na fyddaf yn ateb unrhyw gwestiynau am yr wybodaeth rwyf wedi’i rhoi
welshDeclaration.understandItem2: y gellir dwyn achos troseddol yn fy erbyn am dwyll os penderfynir fy mod heb ddweud y gwir neu wedi bod yn anonest yn fwriadol

welshLegalStatement.intro: Mae’r datganiad hwn wedi’i seilio ar yr wybodaeth rydych wedi’i rhoi yn eich cais. Bydd yn cael ei storio fel cofnod cyhoeddus.
welshLegalStatement.deceased: Deceased fn Deceased ln ar undefined a bu farw ar undefined, ac roedd fel arfer yn preswylio yng Nghymru a Lloegr.
welshLegalStatement.applicant: Rwyf i, Applicant fn Applicant ln o Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom, yn gwneud y datganiad canlynol:

value.name: Rwy’n ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys fel Applicant fn Applicant ln, ac rwy’n gwneud cais am brofiant.
value.sign: Byddaf yn anfon i’r Gofrestrfa Brofiant yr hyn a gredaf i fod yn ewyllys a thestament gwir a gwreiddiol olaf Deceased fn Deceased ln.

welshLegalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: Hyd eithaf fy ngwybodaeth a’m cred, nid oedd unrhyw dir wedi’i freinio yn Deceased fn Deceased ln a setlwyd cyn marwolaeth (ac nid drwy ewyllys) Deceased fn Deceased ln ac a oedd dal yn dir a setlwyd er gwaethaf y farwolaeth honno.
welshLegalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: Mae gwerth gros yr ystad yn £2000000.00 ac mae gwerth net yr ystad yn £1000000.00.
